      This method cascades all open InternalFrames inside of the DesktopPane.

      This method deserializes, loads object (creates object instance), from the specified path with the specified extension
      static double getNextWholeRoot(int x)
      This method returns the whole root (without decimal remainders) of the first 32 numbers.

      This method builds the TreePath for the passed TreeNode

      This method returns the random color.

      This method returns the scaled Icon from the specified URL path.

      This method serializes (Saves) the specified object to the specified path with the specified extension.
      static void tileGrid()
      This method tiles opened InternalFrames into Grid view.
      static void tileHorizontally()
      This method tiles horizontally all of the open InternalFrames inside of DesktopPane.
      static void tileVertically()
      This method tiles vertically all of the open InternalFrames inside of DesktopPane.
      static ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> traverse(TreeModel model, Object o, Object node, ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> references)
      This is recursive method which traverses through the TreeModel and finds the same reference inside the model for the passed node.
      After finding and filling it returns the array of all found references.
      static void traverseAndRecounstructObservers(TreeModel model, Object o, Observer observer)
      This method traverses through the specified model and adds observer for each element inside the model.
      General purpose of the method is reconstructing observers to the deserialized TreeNode which dosen't have any observers.
      static ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> traverseV2(TreeModel model, Object o, Object node, ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> references)
      This is another version of traverse(TreeModel, Object, Object, ArrayList)
      It is recursive method which traverses through the TreeModel and finds the reference with same original inside the model for the passed node.
      After finding and filling it returns the array of all found references.

    • Method Detail

      • getScaledIcon

        public static Icon getScaledIcon(URL imageURL)
        This method returns the scaled Icon from the specified URL path.
        Parameters:
        imageURL - an URL url (path) to the icon that needs to be scaled;
        Returns:
        an scaled Icon which is the dimension 18x18
        See Also:
        Icon, URL

      • cascadeWindows

        public static void cascadeWindows()
        This method cascades all open InternalFrames inside of the DesktopPane.

      • tileHorizontally

        public static void tileHorizontally()
        This method tiles horizontally all of the open InternalFrames inside of DesktopPane.

      • tileVertically

        public static void tileVertically()
        This method tiles vertically all of the open InternalFrames inside of DesktopPane.

      • getNextWholeRoot

        public static double getNextWholeRoot(int x)
        This method returns the whole root (without decimal remainders) of the first 32 numbers.

      • tileGrid

        public static void tileGrid()
        This method tiles opened InternalFrames into Grid view.

      • traverse

        public static ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> traverse(TreeModel model,
                                                  Object o,
                                                  Object node,
                                                  ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> references)
        This is recursive method which traverses through the TreeModel and finds the same reference inside the model for the passed node.
        After finding and filling it returns the array of all found references.
        Parameters:
        model - an reference to the TreeModelyou want to traverse through.
        o - an Object inside the TreeModel you want to begin your search with.
        node - an Object represents the reference of the item you are searching for inside the TreeModel
        references - an ArrayList of MutableTreeNodes which is used for recursive purpose. In this Method to work here you must pass the NULL.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of MutableTreeNodes which contains all the found references.
        See Also:
        TreeModel, MutableTreeNode

      • traverseV2

        public static ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> traverseV2(TreeModel model,
                                                    Object o,
                                                    Object node,
                                                    ArrayList<MutableTreeNode> references)
        This is another version of traverse(TreeModel, Object, Object, ArrayList)
        It is recursive method which traverses through the TreeModel and finds the reference with same original inside the model for the passed node.
        After finding and filling it returns the array of all found references.
        Parameters:
        model - an reference to the TreeModelyou want to traverse through.
        o - an Object inside the TreeModel you want to begin your search with.
        node - an Object represents the reference of the item you are searching for inside the TreeModel
        references - an ArrayList of MutableTreeNodes which is used for recursive purpose. In this Method to work here you must pass the NULL.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of MutableTreeNodes which contains all the found references.
        See Also:
        TreeModel, MutableTreeNode

      • getPath

        public static TreePath getPath(MutableTreeNode treeNode)
        This method builds the TreePath for the passed TreeNode
        Parameters:
        treeNode - an MutableTreeNode for which you want to build TreePath
        Returns:
        an TreePath for the passed MutableTreeNode
        See Also:
        MutableTreeNode, TreePath

      • serialize

        public static void serialize(String path,
                             Object object,
                             String extension)
        This method serializes (Saves) the specified object to the specified path with the specified extension.
        Parameters:
        path - an String which represents the path where you want your object to be serialized on the system.
        object - an Object which you want to serialize (save).
        extension - an String which is the extension you wan to save your file with for example .proj(Project1.proj).

      • deserialize

        public static Object deserialize(String path,
                                 String extension)
        This method deserializes, loads object (creates object instance), from the specified path with the specified extension
        Parameters:
        path - an String from which location you want your object to be loaded from
        extension - an String which represents the extension of the file you want to deserialize
        Returns:
        an Object which instance is created from the specified parameters

      • traverseAndRecounstructObservers

        public static void traverseAndRecounstructObservers(TreeModel model,
                                                    Object o,
                                                    Observer observer)
        This method traverses through the specified model and adds observer for each element inside the model.
        General purpose of the method is reconstructing observers to the deserialized TreeNode which dosen't have any observers.
        Parameters:
        model - an reference to the TreeModelyou want to traverse through.
        o - an Object inside the TreeModel you want to begin your search with.
        observer - an Observer you want to add to the TreeNodes
        See Also:
        Observer, TreeModel

      • getRandomColor

        public static Color getRandomColor()
        This method returns the random color.
        Returns:
        an random Color
        See Also:
        Color
